preferences.description: Always convert digits to ASCII format
preferences.name: preferASCIIDigits
preferences.title: Prefer ASCII Digits

author: mohancloudworld
description:
A text converter from English to Indic/Indian Scripts and vice versa.
Supported English formats: IAST, ITRANS.
Supported Indic formats: Devanagari/Sanskrit (also marathi), Telugu, Kannada, Gujarati, Tamil and Bengali.
name: parivartan
